Policy.description: The inline policy document that is embedded in the specified IAM role.

properties.name: PolicyName
properties.description: The friendly name (not ARN) identifying the policy.

type.description: The friendly name (not ARN) identifying the policy.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: AssumeRolePolicyDocument
properties.description: The trust policy that is associated with this role.

types.description: The trust policy that is associated with this role.
The trust policy that is associated with this role.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A description of the role that you provide.

type.description: A description of the role that you provide.

properties.name: ManagedPolicyArns
properties.description: A list of Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the IAM managed policies that you want to attach to the role.

type.description: A list of Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the IAM managed policies that you want to attach to the role.

properties.name: MaxSessionDuration
properties.description: The maximum session duration (in seconds) that you want to set for the specified role. If you do not specify a value for this setting, the default maximum of one hour is applied. This setting can have a value from 1 hour to 12 hours.

type.description: The maximum session duration (in seconds) that you want to set for the specified role. If you do not specify a value for this setting, the default maximum of one hour is applied. This setting can have a value from 1 hour to 12 hours.

properties.name: PermissionsBoundary
properties.description: The ARN of the policy used to set the permissions boundary for the role.

type.description: The ARN of the policy used to set the permissions boundary for the role.

properties.name: Policies
properties.description: Adds or updates an inline policy document that is embedded in the specified IAM role.

type.description: Adds or updates an inline policy document that is embedded in the specified IAM role.

properties.name: RoleName
properties.description: A name for the IAM role, up to 64 characters in length.

type.description: A name for the IAM role, up to 64 characters in length.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: A list of tags that are attached to the role.

type.description: A list of tags that are attached to the role.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the role.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the role.

properties.name: RoleId
properties.description: The stable and unique string identifying the role.

type.description: The stable and unique string identifying the role.
